item.description:
Hello all,

Well it's official, I get to stay in the area for at least another year!!! As always, dinner will be served. BYOB If you'd like to bring anything, bring snack food or dessert. We are an equal opportunity game playing group - usually in the same night we get in party and Euro board games, as well as Card games - there is something for everyone. Bring your favorite game along, we always love to try new games too!

Don't forget $1.00 for our awesome leader Nina!

Parking logistics: There is parking on the street, CVS or the funeral home. Please no parking on the side or front of my house. Even if there are parking spaces available in the front they are reserved for other people that live in the house.

Thank you,

Margaret
item.why: Game night at Margarrriiiitttaaaasss - Welcome back Margariiiitttttaaaa party!!!! Yes it's official - I'm staying for at least another year.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Game night at Margariiittttaaaasss
